document_data.name: Karst
document_data.mainbody: '''Karst''' was a ferryman in [[Phlan]] in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Karst was an old individual. He continued his work only because he knew nothing else to do.
document_data.History: Karst managed the ferry that transported people to [[Sokol Keep]] for forty years.{{Cite adventurers league/Secrets of Sokol Keep|10}}
